articles.description: BTC nears $65k key resistance level. Kamala makes positive comments about crypto. PayPal allows businesses to hold crypto. Visa allows banks to test RWAs & smart contracts. Cuban wants to be head of SEC. Silvergate claims about ‘Chokepoint 2.0’ grow. Truflation hacked for $5m. Telegram Wallet blocked in UK & US. Court rules crypto mining boxes are securities. Infinex DeFi platform raises $65m. Ethena announces new stablecoin linked to BUIDL.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 206 - MEMES ARE PUMPING!

articles.description: SUI leads L1 gains as TVL crosses $1bn. Altcoin market cap close to breaking downtrend. SEI becomes top chain for 1 month TVL growth. ETH ETFs sees 3rd largest inflow ever. SEC delays ETH ETF options decision. SOL took most of ETH outflows over last 3 months. SOLETH continues to be trading at resistance. $8.1bn BTC options to expire this week. BTC heading to $500k-$1m in a year: PlanB. Stablecoin supply hits new ATH. Caroline Ellison sentenced to 2 years in jail. SBF & Diddy in the same jail. SEC settles against TUSD for not being collateralised. Gensler gets derided for crypto approach. Hester Pierce admits flaws in SEC crypto policy. Harris against regulation by litigation: Cuban. Golem claims ETH move to CEXs due to staking. Binance refutes data leak claims. Next Y combinator batch has ‘no crypto companies’. Celo overtakes Tron for stablecoin addresses.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 205 - ALTCOINS CONTINUE TO RALLY!

articles.description: BTC needs to top $65.2k to put in a higher high. ETH ETFs see biggest outflow since July. ETH outperformance could be start of ‘alt season’. BlackRock gets 12hr BTC withdrawal from Coinbase. cbBTC only wrapped BTC to not show reserves. Telegram to share user data upon legal requests. EIGEN non-transferability to be removed Sep 30th. TIA announces $100m funding round. TIA deal was OTC token sale ‘done months ago’. Polymarket considers token, trying $50m raise. Maybe we will pay off debt with crypto: Trump. Harris unlikely to give full crypto policy pre-election. 13m Binance users’ data may have been leaked. Caroline Ellison likely won’t serve time in jail.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 204 - MOODENG MOO-NING!

articles.description: Crypto funds saw $321m inflows last week. Kamala commits to crypto & AI expansion. TAO leads gains in AI hype, does 2x in 2 weeks. SUI TVL breaks $900m. Average Q4 returns for BTC is 88%. BTC Google searches down 75% since 2021. BTC 161 days from halving, when it rallied in 2020. Crypto VCs raised $2.2bn this year, well below 2021.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 203 - KAMALA GOES PRO-CRYPTO

articles.description: SOL leads majors as Breakpoint begins. SOL launches Frankendancer on mainnet. Helio Pay allows Shopify items to sell on X. Franklin Templeton to launch fund on SOL. BTC short term holders fall at fastest rate in 12 years. MicroStrategy upsizes convertible note raise to $1bn. BingX loses $52m in hack. $243m crypto heist exposed by ZachXBT. Supreme Court of India hacked on X, shills scam. SocGen launches Euro stablecoin on SOL. Sky agrees to stop using WBTC. Germany shuts down 47 crypto exchanges. Stablecoin’s now 18th biggest holder of treasuries. Consensys lawsuit against SEC dismissed. Partisanship will stop Trump crypto plans: Hoskinson. Scaramucci working with Kamala on crypto.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 202 - SOL STARTS TO SEND IT

articles.description: Crypto rips higher after Fed cuts 50bps. $22bn shorts would be liquidated by $70.5k. SUI continues to lead L1s, does 2.5x in a month. Trump buys burgers with Bitcoin. Bitcoin is hedge against US debt: BlackRock. Commerzbank to offer BTC & ETH trading. Solana unveils Seeker phone, $70m pre-orders Helius Labs raise $21.75m. WazirX hacker moves $32m ETH to Tornado cash. SEC made up crypto regulation ‘out of thin air’. BitGo to launch stablecoin. Revolut considers creating stablecoin. Ethena front-end gets hacked, funds safe.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 201 - CRYPTO FLYS AFTER FED

articles.description: Bitcoin dominance rises ahead of Fed. May see short-term crash after Fed: Hayes. ETH underperformance may reverse soon: BitWise. Vitalik sings during Token 2049 appearance. SUI & FTM continue to outperform in L1s. BNB to introduce gasless stablecoin transfers. Tether market share hits 75%. Australia launches 3-year CBDC program. Russia to pay China in crypto for war supplies. USDC available for Brazil & Mexico bank transfers. We are one of the biggest users of blockchain: Dimon. Kamala may push crypto firms abroad: Nansen CEO. Dragonfly looking to raise $500m fund. Bitget users hit 45m, most growth from TON. Gensler pushed to clarify his stance on airdrops. Binance denies involvement in WazirX hack. Janus Henderson to tokenise fund. TON partners with Curve for stablecoin swaps. LINK & Fireblocks partner for stablecoin issuance. WalletConnect seat to airdrop 185m WCT tokens.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 200 - DONALD TRUMP RECAP

articles.description: Dustin Stockton is known as the “Godfather of Political Finance” but he wasn’t always known this way. He was originally heavily involved in campaigning for Donald Trump and was the lead organizer of January 6. As the protest came closer, he realized things would go south and backed out. From home, he watched Trump supporters raid the capitol building. He knew his life was never going to be the same.
articles.title: How Jan 6. Organizer Became Meme Coin Kingpin

articles.description: Crypto majors bounce with stocks & gold after CPI. Kamala odds flip Trump after Presidential debate. SUI, FTM, ICP, TON lead gains in Alt L1s. Grayscale launches XRP trust, SUI to follow. FTX unstakes part of SOL position, large unlocks in Q1. 5 major announcements coming for SOL this month. SOL active addresses hits ATH for any blockchain. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Pendle introduces Bitcoin yield pools at 45%. POPCAT gets Kraken listing, leads top SOL memes. SUNDOG breaks $300m after ByBit spot listing. Casino tokens rise, RLB up 100% in 2 weeks. Ape Punk sells in ‘heist’ for 10ETH. XCOPY editions & 1/1s see high sales. Fantasy Top trading volume continues to grow. Trump family set to launch crypto project Monday.

articles.author: Terence Zimwara
articles.description: Tether, a stablecoin issuer, said it has collaborated with the U.S. Department of Justice to seize digital assets worth $6 million stolen from victims of crypto confidence schemes. Tether has assisted law enforcement in various jurisdictions, blocking over two billion dollars in USDT and recovering millions for victims. According to the stablecoin issuer, it has […]
articles.title: Tether Aids DOJ in Seizing $6M in Assets Tied to Crypto Scams

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: Frederick Kempe, CEO of the Atlantic Council, highlighted two pressing concerns at the UN General Assembly: the intensifying China-Russia partnership and doubts over US leadership. Alongside former Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice, he warned of mounting global threats, comparing today’s risks to the Cold War. China’s support for Russia and Iran is escalating conflicts, demanding […]
articles.title: China-Russia Alliance Expands, Elevating US Risks in Asia and Middle East

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: An app on Google Play was discovered stealing cryptocurrency from users, employing advanced social engineering and trusted protocols. Check Point Research exposed the app after it had siphoned $70,000, deceiving over 150 victims. The attackers used the Walletconnect protocol to appear legitimate, manipulating Google search rankings and avoiding detection through encryption and obfuscation techniques. Malicious […]
articles.title: Malicious Crypto-Stealing App Exposed on Google Play

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: The Dutch Authority for the Financial Markets (AFM) has issued a warning about the dangers of pump-and-dump schemes in the cryptocurrency space, as new regulations prepare to target this market manipulation tactic. The upcoming Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation (MiCAR), effective from Dec. 30 will ban these practices. AFM Sounds Alarm on Crypto Pump-and-Dump Schemes The […]
articles.title: Dutch Regulator Warns of Crypto Pump-and-Dump, New Regulation to Ban These Schemes

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: Coinbase Institutional’s report highlights optimism for the crypto market, driven by expectations of U.S. rate cuts and China’s monetary stimulus, which could boost bitcoin’s performance in Q4 2024. While bitcoin remains strong, ethereum faces challenges with rising transaction fees and limited impact from U.S. spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs). Coinbase: ‘We Anticipate a Constructive Q4 2024’ […]
articles.title: Coinbase Sees Strong Q4 for Bitcoin, Fueled by US Rate Cuts, China Stimulus

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: A former lawyer with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) anticipates the agency will challenge Judge Analisa Torres’ decision regarding XRP in the Ripple lawsuit. The SEC views the ruling as flawed and is likely to submit an appeal before the approaching Oct. 7 deadline. Ripple XRP Case: SEC Expected to Appeal Judge’s Ruling […]
articles.title: Lawyer Expects SEC to Challenge XRP Ruling as Appeal Deadline Approaches

articles.author: Terence Zimwara
articles.description: On Sept. 27, Bedrock, a liquidity staking platform, experienced a security breach affecting $2 million in liquidity. Bedrock said it has taken steps to address the incident, including integrating with Chainlink for proof of reserves and implementing additional security measures. Exploiter Addresses Identified Bedrock, a liquidity staking platform, confirmed a security incident on Sept. 27 […]
articles.title: Bedrock Bolsters Security Post-$2 Million Hack, Partners With Chainlink

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: On Sunday, Sept. 29, 2024, market data revealed that the TON-powered crypto asset, hamster kombat (HMSTR), experienced a 14% drop against the U.S. dollar over the last day, just three days after its market debut. Initially trading at $0.009993 per token when it first hit major exchanges, HMSTR has since lost over 42% of its […]
articles.title: TON-Based Hamster Kombat Token Plummets 42% in 3 Days

articles.author: Regina Capuz
articles.description: Imagine leading a virtual army, conquering enemy bases, and earning real-world rewards. That’s what Heroes of Mavia, a Web3 play-to-earn strategy game, promises. Find out if Regina thinks it’s worth your time. Last episode’s quick recap Last episode’s Web3 gameplay was action-packed and full of thrills! While playing The Beacon, I found myself holding my […]
articles.title: Why Heroes of Mavia Is Poised to Be Web3’s Next Big Hit

articles.author: Sergio Goschenko
articles.description: According to data from the Central Bank of Bolivia, operations with crypto assets rose in the last three months after the institution lifted a blanket ban on using the banking system for these transactions. Volumes doubled on average, with stablecoins leading the way and transaction numbers also rising. Bolivia Experiences a Crypto Renaissance After Lifting […]
articles.title: Crypto Trading Volumes Double After Lifting of Ban in Bolivia

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
The general consensus is that Bitcoin is gearing up for a rally that would send it past its all-time high in the coming weeks. Given the recent inflows into the cryptocurrency and its recent price performance, analysts are confident of Bitcoin going on a parabolic rally into new price territories in the fourth quarter of 2024. 
 
 
Notably, the $100,000 price mark has remained a psychological target for investors, as it would project the price of the cryptocurrency into six-digit threshold. According to a crypto analyst known as Peter DiCarlo, Bitcoin is looking ready for a run-up to this level. However, a resistance level needs to be cleared first. 
 
Bitcoin Primed For Breakout, Resistance Ahead
 
Taking to social media platform X, Peter DiCarlo shared an interesting price analysis on Bi…
articles.title: Bitcoin Ready For New All-Time High, But Analyst Says It Needs To Clear This Level First

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: Bitcoin miners are finally catching a break after a sluggish September, with hashprice climbing 10.33% in the past 30 days. A solid 8.93% of that bump came within the last four days alone. Hashprice Jumps Nearly 9% in 4 Days: Bitcoin Miners Catch a Break as September Nears End On Aug. 29, 2024, mining revenues […]
articles.title: Hashprice Gains Give Bitcoin Miners a Much-Needed Boost After Sluggish Month

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: In a recent interview with Kitco News, Jp Cortez, the executive director of the Sound Money Defense League, discussed the growing sound money movement across the United States. Cortez emphasized the significance of legislative wins, such as the removal of sales taxes on precious metals in 45 states, and highlighted the increasing trend of de-dollarization. […]
articles.title: Sound Money Defense League Executive: Gold Protects Against Inflation, Fiat Risks

articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
The trek into the metaverse for Mark Zuckerberg has been anything but smooth. His once-risky bet, which cost him more than $100 billion, appears to be paying off handsomely now.
 
His net worth has increased dramatically to $201 billion in less than two years, nearly sixfold. The skyrocketing stock price of Meta Platforms Inc., which has increased by about 60% just this year, is mostly the impetus for this surge.
 
Consequently, Zuckerberg is once again the fourth richest person in the world, behind only Jeff Bezos, Bernard Arnault, and Elon Musk.
 
 
The Metaverse: A Mixed Bag
 
Despite these amazing numbers, the metaverse remains controversy-ridden. While Zuckerberg maintains that it is the future of social interaction, many remain skeptical about it.
 
Some doubters think Meta’s perform…
articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg’s Fortune Swells To Over $200 Billion—The Metaverse Masterstroke

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: Since Jan. 11, 2024, twelve U.S. spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) have been steadily accumulating bitcoin (BTC). This doesn’t include the hefty BTC stash held by Grayscale’s GBTC, which has experienced a total outflow of $20 billion. Right now, these bitcoin funds hold an impressive 924,768.09 BTC, and if they continue scooping up BTC at […]
articles.title: US Bitcoin ETFs Close In on Satoshi’s BTC Stash, Holding 924,768 BTC
